casebody.data:
Friday, August 29, 1997

MOTION DOCKET

97-1792. State v. Loesser.

Cuyahoga App. No. 71480. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and a claimed appeal of right. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of execution of sentence and continuation of bail pending appeal,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for stay of execution of sentence and continuation of bail pending appeal be, and hereby is, granted.

F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., dissent.
